resources.string: The museum is housed in the Louvre Palace, originally built as a fortress in the late 12th century…
Gwanghwamun is the main and largest gate of Gyeongbokgung Palace, in Jongno-gu, Seoul, South Korea.
Tower Bridge is a combined bascule and suspension bridge in London built in 1886–1894.
The Temple of Heaven is an imperial complex of religious buildings situated in the southeastern part…
